com.sun.enterprise.resource.pool.monitor

Class ConnectionPoolProbeProviderUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.enterprise.resource.pool.monitor.ConnectionPoolProbeProviderUtil

  • @Service
public class ConnectionPoolProbeProviderUtil
extends Object
    Utility class to create providers for monitoring purposes.
    Author:
    Shalini M

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectionPoolProbeProviderUtil

        public ConnectionPoolProbeProviderUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • registerProbeProvider

        public void registerProbeProvider()

      • createJcaProbeProvider

        public void createJcaProbeProvider()
        Create probe provider for jcaPool related events. The generated jcaPool probe providers are shared by all jca connection pools. Each jca connection pool will qualify a probe event with its pool name.

      • createJdbcProbeProvider

        public void createJdbcProbeProvider()
        Create probe provider for jdbcPool related events. The generated jdbcPool probe providers are shared by all jdbc connection pools. Each jdbc connection pool will qualify a probe event with its pool name.

      • getConnPoolBootstrap

        public ConnectionPoolStatsProviderBootstrap getConnPoolBootstrap()

      • getJcaProbeProvider

        public ConnectionPoolProbeProvider getJcaProbeProvider()
        Get probe provider for connector connection pool related events
        Returns:
        ConnectorConnPoolProbeProvider

      • getJdbcProbeProvider

        public ConnectionPoolProbeProvider getJdbcProbeProvider()
        Get probe provider for jdbc connection pool related events
        Returns:
        JdbcConnPoolProbeProvider
